add_electrons.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  ===============================================================
00002 !
00003 !                        ADD_ELECTRONS
00004 !
00005 !   $Revision$
00006 !
00007 !   Add neutralising electrons after ions-only const-temp eqm phase
00008 !
00009 !  ===============================================================
00010 
00011 subroutine add_electrons
00012 
00013   use physvars
00014   use treevars
00015   use utils
00016 
00017   integer :: i,p, iseed1
00018   real :: xt, yt, zt
00019 
00020 
00021 
00022 
00023   ! Double # particles/PE
00024   ne = ni
00025   nip = npp
00026   nep = nip
00027   npart = ni+ne
00028   npp = nep+nip
00029 
00030   !  now have nep=nip;  ions (1:nip); electrons  (nip+1:npp) 
00031   !  reverse of usual order, but get mixed up by sorting later
00032 
00033   q(nip+1:npp) = qe        ! plasma electrons
00034 
00035   m(nip+1:npp) = mass_e      ! electron mass
00036 
00037   pepid(nip+1:npp) = me                ! processor ID
00038 
00039 
00040   pelabel(nip+1:npp) =  pelabel(1:nip)  ! Electron labels: 1->ne copied from ions
00041   pelabel(1:nip) = pelabel(1:nip) + ni  ! Augment ion labels: ne+1 -> npart
00042 
00043   ! zero accelerations - should really compute these for electrons
00044   Ex(nip+1:npp) = 0.
00045   Ey(nip+1:npp) = 0.
00046   Ez(nip+1:npp) = 0.
00047   pot(nip+1:npp) = 0.
00048 
00049   work(1:npp) = 1.   ! set work load balanced initially
00050   iseed1 = -7901-me
00051 
00052   !  Place electrons within 1/10 of ave. ion spacing in vicinity of ions
00053   xt = .1*a_ii*(2*rano(iseed1)-1.)
00054   yt = .1*a_ii*(2*rano(iseed1)-1.)          
00055   zt = .1*a_ii*(2*rano(iseed1)-1.)  
00056   x(nip+1:npp) = x(1:nip)+xt
00057   y(nip+1:npp) = y(1:nip)+yt
00058   z(nip+1:npp) = z(1:nip)+zt
00059 
00060   !  Set up thermal distribution
00061   if (vte > 0) then
00062      call maxwell1(ux,nppm,nip+1,nep,vte)
00063      call maxwell1(uy,nppm,nip+1,nep,vte)
00064      call maxwell1(uz,nppm,nip+1,nep,vte)
00065      call scramble_v(nip+1,nep)   ! remove x,y,z correlations
00066   else
00067      call cold_start(nip+1,nep)
00068   endif
00069 
00070   !  Set ion velocities to zero
00071   ux(1:nip) = 0.
00072   uy(1:nip) = 0.
00073   uz(1:nip) = 0.
00074 
00075 end subroutine add_electrons
